title: Infusion Pump — Occlusion Alarm Troubleshooting
text: Checklist: inspect for kinks or closed clamps; check for infiltration; flush line if policy allows; verify pressure limits; replace tubing/set if unresolved; escalate to biomed if alarm persists.

title: Vital Signs Monitor — SpO₂ Signal Loss
text: Ensure correct probe size and placement; warm extremity; remove nail polish; try ear/forehead probe for poor perfusion; clean sensor surfaces.

title: Syringe Pump Calibration
text: Verify syringe brand/size; run calibration routine per manual; document results; remove device from service if out of tolerance; notify biomed.

title: Defibrillator Daily Check
text: Verify battery level, pads, and self-test log; perform energy delivery test using a test load; restock disposables; record on checklist.

title: EHR Downtime — Read-only Mode
text: Switch to downtime forms; document meds on paper MAR; batch-scan for backload when restored; timestamp and sign entries.

title: NIBP Cuff Error
text: Check hose/cuff integrity and size; reposition; run leak test; replace cuff; if persistent, open a helpdesk ticket with device ID and room.

title: Telemetry Lead-Off
text: Prep skin; place leads per diagram; replace worn electrodes; secure cables; verify signal quality on central monitor.

title: Ventilator High Pressure Alarm
text: Check for secretions or kinks; assess compliance/tidal volume; coordinate with RT; do not silence without investigation; consider suctioning.

title: IV Pump Battery Maintenance
text: Cycle batteries monthly; replace if capacity below threshold; log serial, service date, and tested capacity in CMMS.

title: Portable X-ray Warmup
text: Run warmup before first use; for artifacts, run detector calibration; if unresolved, contact imaging support and log error code.

title: Printer Jam at Nurses’ Station
text: Open rear access; remove jammed paper; fan/realign stack; run self-test; if recurring, open ticket and attach printer status page.

title: Badge Reader Intermittent
text: Clean reader; verify cabling; check user permissions in directory; escalate if hardware fault suspected; record failed swipe times.

title: Barcode Scanner Not Reading
text: Clean lens; ensure symbology enabled; verify HID mode; test with known-good barcode; reboot workstation if needed.

title: Network Port Down
text: Check link lights; swap patch cable; verify switch port enabled; identify port ID for networking ticket; label cable after change.

title: Glucose Meter QC Failure
text: Verify control solution dates; clean strip port; repeat QC; remove from service and notify lab if second failure; document lot numbers.

title: Med Dispensing Cabinet Alert
text: Check bin sensors; reconcile inventory; run self-check; escalate to pharmacy IT for persistent faults; capture cabinet log excerpt.

title: Ultrasound — No Image
text: Check probe connection; try alternate probe; run probe self-test; inspect for gel contamination; open vendor support case if needed.

title: SpO₂ Probe Inventory
text: Maintain minimum par level of 6 per unit; trigger restock when on-hand < par; record device ID and date.

title: EHR Barcode Med Admin Tips
text: Scan wristband before medication; verify the five rights; document exceptions; follow downtime workflow if scanner unavailable.

title: Nurse Call System — Alert Flood
text: Check for stuck call button; inspect room panel; notify facilities; open ticket if controller fault suspected; document room numbers.
